foreignData.text: Wähle eine Karte aus Deiner Hand und lege diese auf Deine Bibliothek: Verhindere allen Schaden, der von einem Spontanzauber oder einer Hexerei zugefügt wird. (Weiterer Schaden aus dieser Quelle wird normal behandelt.)

name: Hidden Retreat
originalText: Choose a card in your hand and put it on top of your library: Prevent all damage from an instant or sorcery. (Treat further damage from that source normally.)

rulings.text: This can be used on damage to a creature, player, or planeswalker.
This can be used on instant or sorcery spells on the stack, but not on abilities.

text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by target instant or sorcery spell this turn.
